inboundReferenceNotes.title: Extraterrestrial Civilizations Don't Want To Contact Us

childMdx.excerpt: The  Mediocrity Principle  states:"if an item is drawn at random from one of several sets or categories, it's likelier to come from the most…
We still don't know. But we have some assumptions, which helps us to think and prepare for some possibilities. Famously, The  Fermi Paradox…

siteMetadata.title: Adam's Brain
siteMetadata.description: I'm Adam, this is a network of my brain. You can find my thoughts, journals here, and you can see that they are interlinked to each other, like nodes on a net, which means that the path you take to explore my thoughts, is very likely that it's unique to you. Isn't it interesting?
